targetQuestion: Have you ever chosen a surf clothing product specifically because of its sustainability (such as organic, Fairtrade, recycled) attributes? - Response

topOverall.question: Have you ever:(select one per action) - heard of ‘Worn Wear’
Have you ever:(select one per action) - subscribed to the Patagonia online newsletter
Have you ever purchased a Patagonia product? - Response
Have you ever:(select one per action) - visited the Patagonia website
Have you ever… (select one per option) - Participated in a demonstration about an environmental organisation/cause
Have you ever:(select one per action) - viewed Patagonia’s Facebook page
Have you ever:(select one per action) - viewed Patagonia’s Instagram page
Have you ever:(select one per action) - watched a film made by Patagonia (such as Reef Beneath, 180 degrees South, Nevertown, Takanya)

values.question: Please indicate your agreement with the following statements: (select one per statement) - I think that the brands in the surf industry currently have a strong focus on being sustainable

Please indicate how much you agree with the following statements:(select one response per statement) - I often tell family and friends about the benefits of purchasing environmentally friendly products
Please indicate your agreement with the following statements: (select one per statement) - I would change my purchasing to support brands who can demonstrate a commitment to being sustainable
Please indicate your agreement with the following statements: (select one per statement) - I want to know more about what the brands in the surf industry are doing about being sustainable

Please indicate how much you agree with the following statements:(select one response per statement) - I am concerned about the environment and sustainability, but only if it has a direct impact on me
Please indicate your agreement with the following statements: (select one per statement) - Brands in the surf industry should engage Government on environmental and social issues
Please indicate your agreement with the following statements: (select one per statement) - Brands in the surf industry should support/campaign on environmental and social issues
Please indicate your agreement with the following statements: (select one per statement) - It is important for the brands in the surf industry to demonstrate leadership in being sustainable

Please indicate how much you agree with the following statements:(select one response per statement) - I feel conflicted by my desire to enjoy my current lifestyle, and my concern about the environmental impact of my purchasing choices

Please indicate how much you agree with the following statements:(select one response per statement) - The fact that a company cares about the impact of their activities on the environment and community gives me more incentive to buy their products or services

Please indicate how much you agree with the following statements:(select one response per statement) - I often find environmental issues complex and I would like clearer information about the environmental benefits and impacts of my product and service choices

Please indicate how much you agree with the following statements:(select one response per statement) - I am often sceptical about the health and environmental claims that companies make about their products and services

Please indicate your agreement with the following statements: (select one per statement) - I believe that sexualised imagery of women in advertising and promotion is an issue that the surf industry needs to address

Please indicate how much you agree with the following statements:(select one response per statement) - I believe that it is important for companies to consider the impact of their operations on the environment and community and not just make profits

importance.question: When considering which surf clothing product to buy, how important are the following aspects to you right now in deciding which one to purchase?(select one per aspect) - includes Organic materials (eg. cotton grown without pesticides to minimise environmental impacts)

When considering which surf clothing product to buy, how important are the following aspects to you right now in deciding which one to purchase?(select one per aspect) - includes Recycled materials (eg. polyester made from re-used plastic)

When considering which surf clothing product to buy, how important are the following aspects to you right now in deciding which one to purchase?(select one per aspect) - includes Fairtrade materials (eg. cotton sourced from producers in developing countries and certified to provide enhanced workplace, social and environmental outcomes)

When considering which surf clothing product to buy, how important are the following aspects to you in deciding which one to purchase:(select one per aspect) - Sustainability attributes (eg. organic, Fairtrade, recycled)

When considering which surf clothing product to buy, how important are the following aspects to you right now in deciding which one to purchase?(select one per aspect) - includes Petroleum free materials (eg. Yulex wetsuits that contain no petrochemicals)
When considering which surf clothing product to buy, how important are the following aspects to you right now in deciding which one to purchase?(select one per aspect) - has minimal Packaging

Five years from now, how important do you think sustainability aspects (organic, Fairtrade, recycled, cruelty free, petroleum free) will be in your decision making about which surf brand to purchase:(select one) - Response

When considering which surf clothing product to buy, how important are the following aspects to you right now in deciding which one to purchase?(select one per aspect) - includes Cruelty free materials (eg. down filling from certified cruelty-free farms)
When considering which surf clothing product to buy, how important are the following aspects to you in deciding which one to purchase:(select one per aspect) - Brand
When considering which surf clothing product to buy, how important are the following aspects to you in deciding which one to purchase:(select one per aspect) - Technical features/Performance
If there are any other important aspects that you consider when purchasing surf clothing, please outline them: - Open-Ended Response
When considering which surf clothing product to buy, how important are the following aspects to you in deciding which one to purchase:(select one per aspect) - Fashion

When considering which surf clothing product to buy, how important are the following aspects to you in deciding which one to purchase:(select one per aspect) - Easy access (eg. free shipping online, stocked in local store)
When considering which surf clothing product to buy, how important are the following aspects to you in deciding which one to purchase:(select one per aspect) - Size/Fit
Please indicate which of these are most important for surf companies to focus on:  (select in order of importance) - Local issues (eg. pollution on beaches, logging of native forests)

Please indicate which of these are most important for surf companies to focus on:  (select in order of importance) - National issues (eg. protection of the Barrier Reef, oil drilling in the Great Australian Bight)
When considering which surf clothing product to buy, how important are the following aspects to you in deciding which one to purchase:(select one per aspect) - Quality/Durability
When considering which surf clothing product to buy, how important are the following aspects to you in deciding which one to purchase:(select one per aspect) - Price/Value
What do you believe are the most important environmental / social issues that brands in the surf industry should tackle? - Open-Ended Response
Please indicate which of these are most important for surf companies to focus on:  (select in order of importance) - International Issues (eg. rising sea levels, climate change)

For each brand below, please indicate how much consideration you believe is currently being given by that organisation to the sustainability of their products and business operations: (select one per brand) - Rip Curl

For each brand below, please indicate how much consideration you believe is currently being given by that organisation to the sustainability of their products and business operations: (select one per brand) - Patagonia
